JsonXsltSender
XsltSender
SendersEndpoint
Perform an XSLT transformation with a specified stylesheet or XPath-expression.
See also
Github - XsltSender Implementation Examples
Javadoc - org.frankframework.senders.XsltSender
Syntax
Copy
<XsltSender />
Attributes
Required

This component has no required attributes

Optional
ATTRIBUTE NAME & DESCRIPTION	TYPE	DEFAULT
styleSheetName	text	-
Location of stylesheet to apply to the input message
styleSheetNameSessionKey	text	-
Session key to retrieve stylesheet location. Overrides stylesheetName or xpathExpression attribute
styleSheetCacheSize	number	100
Size of cache of stylesheets retrieved from styleSheetNameSessionKey
xpathExpression	text	-
Alternatively: XPath-expression to create stylesheet from
omitXmlDeclaration	boolean	false, if not set in stylesheet
Omit the XML declaration on top of the output. If not set, the value specified in the st
